ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh...I d work on my brewing again, if I could play Beer Barrel Polka on the accordian at the wiz spires in Gfay during primetime.  :) Rooollll ouuuut the
ygData.messageBody:
Heh...I'd work on my brewing again, if I could play Beer Barrel Polka on the
accordian at the wiz spires in Gfay during primetime. :)

Rooollll ouuuut the barrel! :)

At

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 4:54 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)


ROFL on both!

I think an Accordian should improve our Appalling Screech.

Everyone Polka!!!!

---Windleaf
